attributes.action: Change family Law to enable grandparents to have rights to have contact with their Grandchildren.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
One million children are denied contact with their Grandchildren, due to family breakdown.
Although Grandparents can try to obtain a court order, it can be very costly and even if the court allow that contact,more often than not if the mum/dad decides not to adhere to the order, nothing is done about it. Every Child Matters and they have the right to have contact with their Grandparents.

rejection.details:
This petiton overlaps with several already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/scottishrights/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
